name: Jigsawscapes - Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Jigsawscapes - Jigsaw Puzzles is a welcomed and addictive jigsaw puzzle game. You can download jigsaw puzzle game for your iPhone and iPad. You get 7000+ jigsaw puzzles everyday to train your brain and we add 20 new jigsaw puzzles every day. Our jigsaw puzzles game is designed for beginners and advanced players at the same time. Playing jigsaw puzzles everyday can help train your brain and help you get relaxed. It’s good for your brain, logical thinking and memory. Jigsaw puzzle game is a good time killer for all ages.

Jigsaw Puzzles - Classic Game has no missing pieces. There are 7000+ amazing jigsaw puzzles. You can choose difficulties for each puzzle by selecting the number of pieces. Our jigsaw puzzle game is like real jigsaw puzzles. We offer many categories like animals, sceneries, food etc.. You can play jigsaw puzzle game both online and offline.

Key Features
-No missing pieces: Finish every jigsaw puzzle as you want because there are no missing pieces at all.
-Daily jigsaw puzzle challenge - Complete Daily Challenges and collect trophies.
-Categories: We offer many categories, including animals, food, sceneries, houses, plants, landmarks etc.. You can choose whatever you want.
-Choose difficulty: Choose how to play your jigsaw puzzle for each puzzle by choosing the number of pieces.
-Rotate Mode: Rotate pieces to finish the puzzles
-My Puzzle Collection: Collect all the puzzles you have finished all in one place.
-Achievement System: See the puzzles in progress and resume whenever you want.
-Online & offline mode：Our jigsaw puzzle game doesn’t require internet connection. You can play without internet.
-HD pictures：All pictures are high definition and colorful. It’s not just a puzzle but also a feast to your eyes.
-Custom background: Play the jigsaw puzzles against the background you like.
-Zoom in and zoom out: By zoom in and out you can easily solve the jigsaw puzzles.
-For both kids and adults: All the jigsaw puzzles are for kids and adults at the same time.

Our jigsaw puzzle game app has an intuitive interface, easy control, clear layout and well balanced difficulty levels for beginners and advanced players. It’s not only a good time killer but also trains your brain and helps you get relaxed.

Jigsaw puzzle is a classic puzzle people have been playing since hundreds of years ago. People love jigsaw puzzles. Everybody should play jigsaw puzzles for their mind and brain.

Take a look at the high definition pictures and you can play them online and offline. Putting all the pieces together is like doing magic. It’s so fun and relaxing. Wonderful and colorful time killer!
